_description: Aircraft note definitions for Baltic Approaches module. Notes A-M have different meanings than Red Storm.

A.description: Use same bomb point load for Deep Strike and Naval Strike raids

B.description: May Spot Jam [11.34] two radars at the same time

D.description: If tasked with Escort Jamming [8.341] may carry HARMs [17.54] and attack naval or land radars

G.description: May do Max Turns as Free Turns [8.32]

H.description: A/V -1: If tasked with Bombing, SEAD, Recon, or Rescue Support

I.description: Flt: May carry AIM-7 and AIM-54 RAAM at the same time

J.description: If tasked with Maritime Patrol, may carry Harpoon and attack naval targets

K.description: If tasked with Recon, missile load is AIM-9L (6), AIM-7M (3)

L.description: AAX-1 sensor: Automatic visual ID at end of Detection Phase of one die detected enemy flight in forward arc, line of sight, and same altitude as 1-8 hex range. Day only

M.description: Large Aircraft [19.22] (see B-40 Climbing limitations) and Poor SAM Defense [15.32]
